title: Tasty Cheesy Chicken ( Leftover ) Wrap Recipe
content:
Super easy and fast wrap recipe to use up leftover chicken. If you have some cooked chapati in the fridge then this recipe can be put together in just a few minutes.

This is a simple wrap to put together using some leftover chicken and cheese. Such an easy recipe to make and taste so delicious. Perfect to put in a kids lunch box.

 

Leftover Cheesy Chicken Wrap Recipe

Prep time: 5 mins

Cook time: 5 mins

Total time: 10 mins

 

Recipe type: Breakfast

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 2 wrap

 

Ingredients

Chapati or Tortilla - 2

Tomato Ketchup or Pasta Sauce - 2 tablespoons

Cheese Slices or Grated Cheese - ¼ cup or 2 slices

Cooked Chicken Shredded - 1 cup

Onion Slices as needed (optional)

Oil - 1 teaspoon

 

Instructions

Take chapati and spread the top with some ketchup or any sauce.

Sprinkle over cheese or cheese slice.

Top with cooked chicken and onions.

Roll it well.

Heat oil in a pan, cook till golden on both sides.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
